# Microorganisms
## Change Log
```{r, echo = FALSE}
datatable(
  mo_change_log,
  rownames = FALSE,
  selection = "none",
  filter = "top"
)
```

# Breakpoints
## Log
```{r, echo = FALSE}
if (is.null(bp_log) || nrow(bp_log) == 0) {
  cat("Data were pre-interpreted and no breakpoints were applied.")
} else {
  DT::datatable(
    bp_log,
    rownames = FALSE,
    selection = "none",
    filter = "top"
  )
}
```

# UTI
## Log
```{r, echo = FALSE}
if (is.null(bp_log) || nrow(bp_log) == 0) {
  cat("This log displays only if MIC values were interepretted within the app.")
} else {
  DT::datatable(
    uti_log,
    rownames = FALSE,
    selection = "none",
    filter = "top"
  )
}
```
